member.name: T:Property.StringsCallbacks
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Property.StringsCallbacks.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Property.StringsCallbacks.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Property.StringsCallbacks.CANT_OBTAIN_TIMER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Instance creation method of a timer prototype returned null. Null values are not supported for timer instances..

member.name: P:Property.StringsCallbacks.CANT_OBTAIN_WORKER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Instance creation method of a worker prototype returned null. Null values are not supported for worker instances..
